document_data.caption: A portrait of Princess Tanalasta.
document_data.name: Tanalasta Obarskyr
document_data.refs2e: {{Cite dragon annual/1999/Rogues Gallery: Beyond the High Road|135}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Tanalasta Obarskyr''' (known informally as '''Tanny''' or '''Tana''') was the eldest daughter of King [[Azoun IV]] and [[Filfaeril Obarskyr]]. She was the heir of the throne of [[Cormyr]] until her death in the {{YearlinkName|1371}}.
document_data.Relationships:
It was rumored that she was having a secret romance with [[Aunadar Bleth]].

She had conflicts with her parents about her belief in [[Chauntea]]. She was the mother of [[Azoun V]].
document_data.Description: Tanalasta was thin and stood {{SI|6|ft|c|long=yes}} tall. Some found her rather plain and delicate in appearance, while others found her exceptionally beautiful.
document_data.Possessions: Tanalasta had a hollow metal sphere that, upon spoken command, could transform into a key to unlock a secret vault in the depths of the royal palace. It was one of only five; the others possessed by the king, queen, [[Vangerdahast]], and Tanalasta's sister, [[Alusair Obarskyr|Alusair]].
